creditline: Gift of Thomas Murray in honor of Catherine Murray Barnes
description: wood plaque with painted image of a dark horse with a saddle with orange straps and ties; mountains in URQ; trees in distance in ULC; inscription in LRC; inscription on back
markings: on back on sticker: 1695 / Genroku / 8th year
medium: Ink and color on cryptomeria wood (sugi)
title: Votive painting of a sacred horse
